appSync.description: Feature Flags related to AppSync backed APIs.

generateGraphQLPermissions.description: Changes the permission format to grant access to graphql operations instead of appsync control plane operations

values.description: Creates IAM policies to allow Query/Mutations
Uses previous policy format which allows control plane access to AppSync

graphQLTransformer.description: Feature Flag related to GraphQL Transformer

addMissingOwnerFields.description: Automatically add owner field to type when owner fields are not in the type

values.description: Inserts the owner field from auth rules when its missing in type
Doesn't insert the owner field automatically

improvePluralization.description: Use word specific pluralization instead of only appending an "s" to every word. Note: this feature flag is only respected when using GraphQL Transformer v1.

values.description: When pluralizing values i.e. for list resolvers, 'Match' becomes 'Matches'
When pluralizing values i.e. for list resolvers, 'Match' becomes 'Matchs'

validateTypeNameReservedWords.description: Throw an error when compiling the GraphQL schema if a type name is a reserved word.

values.description: Throws an error if a type name is a reserved word.
Allows compilation to pass with reserved words as type names. However, you may encounter downstream GraphQL errors.

useExperimentalPipelinedTransformer.description: Use pipeline resolver-based GraphQL Transformer (GraphQL Transformer vNext).

values.description: Enable pipeline resolver-based GraphQL Transformer (GraphQL Transformer vNext).
Disables pipeline resolver-based GraphQL Transformer.

enableIterativeGsiUpdates.description: Enable multiple GSI updates through iterative incremental deployments.

values.description: GraphQL schemas changes can contain multiple GSI changes.
Throws Error when mutating more than 1 GSIs in update flow. .

secondaryKeyAsGSI.description: Changes the behaviour of @key directive to always create GSIs.

values.description: @key will always create GSIs for named keys.
@key create an LSI when the named key includes a primary field.

skipOverrideMutationInputTypes.description: If a custom mutation is defined on a model, prevent the regeneration of that mutation

values.description: If a custom create, update, or delete mutation is defined on a model, the input will not be regenerated
The GraphQL Transformer will recreate inputs for models even if they have the custom mutations specified

transformerVersion.description: Sets which version of the GraphQL Transformer will be used

values.description: The GraphQL Transformer V1 will be used
The GraphQL Transformer V2 will be used

suppressSchemaMigrationPrompt.description: Prevent the CLI from prompting for schema migration

values.description: GraphQL Transformer V1 projects will not be prompted to migrate to V2
GraphQL Transformer V1 projects will be prompted to migrate to V2

securityEnhancementNotification.description: Adds notification of @auth updates to improve security for @primaryKey and @index

values.description: A notification with a prompt will appear, after which security updates are automatically applied and no further prompt will appear
There is no notification of security updates

showFieldAuthNotification.description: Adds a notification of @auth security change.

values.description: A notification with a prompt will appear, after which security updates are automatically applied and no further prompt will appear
There is no notification of security updates

useSubUsernameForDefaultIdentityClaim.description: Changes the default identity claim to for owner-based @auth from 'username' to 'sub::username'

values.description: Uses a default owner field format of '<sub>::<username>' to write records and reads both '<username>' and '<sub>::<username>'
Uses a default owner field format of '<username>' to write records and reads '<username>'

useFieldNameForPrimaryKeyConnectionField.description: Changes the naming convention for primary key connection fields.

values.description: Uses 'Id' in the name. (Type + RelatedType + Id)
Uses the related type field name in the name. (Type + RelatedType + RelatedTypeFieldName)

enableAutoIndexQueryNames.description: Changes the behaviour of @index directive to auto-generate Queries for indexes if no 'queryField' is provided.

values.description: An empty 'queryField' will cause a Query to be auto-generated. Explicit null value will disable this functionality
A Query will only be created if the 'queryField' is explicitly set

respectPrimaryKeyAttributesOnConnectionF.description: Changes the behavior of relational directives on model types that contain a custom primary key by generating connection fields that respect the attributes of the primary key and sort key fields. The changes include naming convention, the number of connected fields, and their field types. In addition, this changes the code generation for DataStore models of all platforms to enable the custom primary key feature.

values.description: Only one connection field with type ID generated on connected models. Model-gen with custom primary key feature is disabled.
Connection field(s) are generated respecting the attributes of priamry key and sort key fields. Model-gen with custom primary key feature is enabled.

shouldDeepMergeDirectiveConfigDefaults.description: Performs a deep merge with default directives and custom directives.

values.description: Merge default directives and custom directives with a single level depth. Custom directives will take precedent.
Merge default directives and custom directives with unlimitted depth. Custom directives will take precedent.

populateOwnerFieldForStaticGroupAuth.description: Populates the owner field automatically if the user is already authorized by static user pool authorization rules

values.description: If the user is authorized, the owner field is automatically populated
If the user is authorized by static user pool authorization rules, the owner field needs to be explicitly set by the developer

frontend-ios.description: Feature Flag related to iOS projects

enableXcodeIntegration.description: Automatically add DataStore / API models to the Xcode project.

values.description: All newly generated DataStore/API models are auto-added to the Xcode project
All newly generated DataStore/API models are NOT auto-added to the Xcode project.

enableCaseInsensitivity.description: Toggles case insensitivity for Cognito login mechanisms (username, email etc..)

values.description: Emails and usernames are case insensitive
Emails and usernames are case sensitive.

useInclusiveTerminology.description: Toggles terminology used for allow and deny lists.

values.description: The terms allowlist and denylist are used.
The legacy terms whitelist and blacklist are used.

breakCircularDependency.description: Toggles the creation of auth triggers

values.description: Creates auth triggers as custom Lambdas to be used with Apis and Storage.
Creates auth triggers via Cognito CloudFormation

forceAliasAttributes.description: Forces the use of aliasAttributes with Cognito rather than usernameAttributes

values.description: Forces the CLI to use aliasAttributes when creating auth, allowing for a preferred_username
Continue to use usernameAttributes with Cognito

useEnabledMfas.description: Allows the use of only TOTP if only phone_number is configured, if another attribute is added SMS MFA is enabled

values.description: Allow TOTP to be configured for login by itself
TOTP cannot be used alone for login with Cognito

useAppsyncModelgenPlugin.description: Choose between implementations of internal DataStore model generator package. Refer https://github.com/aws-amplify/amplify-codegen/blob/main/FeatureFlags.md

values.description: [Recommended] Use the models generator internal package implementation at https://github.com/aws-amplify/amplify-codegen/tree/main/packages/appsync-modelgen-plugin
Use the deprecated models generator package implementation at https://github.com/aws-amplify/amplify-cli/tree/main/packages/amplify-codegen-appsync-model-plugin

useDocsGeneratorPlugin.description: Choose between implementations of internal GraphQL documents generator package. Refer https://github.com/aws-amplify/amplify-codegen/blob/main/FeatureFlags.md

values.description: [Recommended] Use the GraphQL documents generator internal package implementation at https://github.com/aws-amplify/amplify-codegen
Use the deprecated GraphQL documents generation package implementation at https://github.com/aws-amplify/amplify-cli/tree/main/packages/amplify-graphql-docs-generator

useTypesGeneratorPlugin.description: Choose between implementations of internal GraphQL types generator package. Refer https://github.com/aws-amplify/amplify-codegen/blob/main/FeatureFlags.md

values.description: [Recommended] Use the types generator internal package implementation at https://github.com/aws-amplify/amplify-codegen
Use the deprecated types generation package implementation at https://github.com/aws-amplify/amplify-cli/tree/main/packages/amplify-graphql-types-generator

cleanGeneratedModelsDirectory.description: Clears the generated models folder before they are re-generated.

values.description: Recommended to be set true when there are no hand-written files in the modelgen output folder.
Does not remove pre-existing files from the modelgen output folder. This would retain the generated models even after the corresponding types are removed from the GraphQL schema.

retainCaseStyle.description: Retains the case style developer uses while naming the GraphQL types in schema

values.description: Retain the case style used for naming the GraphQL types in the schema. Refer https://github.com/aws-amplify/amplify-codegen/pull/89
Generate camelCase/PascalCase variable names for types irrespective of the case style used for naming the types.

addTimestampFields.description: Add read-only timestamp fields in modelgen. For more infomation please refer change logs of amplify repos

values.description: [Recommended] Add read-only timestamp `createdAt` and `updatedAt` fields in modelgen. Minimum version for amplify library: amplify-ios@1.9.0, amplify-android@1.17.2
No read-only timestamp fields will be added

enableDartNullSafety.description: Generate Dart models with null safety for Flutter applications using DataStore.

values.description: [Recommended] Generate Dart models with null safety. Minimum supported version for Amplify library: amplify-flutter is 0.2.0
Generate Dart models without null safety

handleListNullabilityTransparently.description: Configure the nullability of the List and List components in Datastore Models generation

values.description: [Recommended] Respect the nullability of List types as specified in the GraphQL schema. Refer https://docs.amplify.aws/cli/migration/list-nullability for more information.
Use the nullability specification of list components to decide the nullability of List.

emitAuthProvider.description: Adds auth provider details to iOS models

values.description: [Recommended] Adds auth provider details to iOS models
iOS models will not be able to access auth provider details

generateIndexRules.description: Adds key/index details to iOS models

values.description: [Recommended] Adds key/index details to iOS models
iOS models will not be able to access key/index details

generateModelsForLazyLoadAndCustomSelect.description: Generate models for lazy loading and custom selection set

values.description: [Recommended] Add support for lazy loading and custom selection set.
models will not support selection set customization and lazy loading.

latestRegionSupport.description: Feature Flags related to region mapping support.

values.description: us-west-1, eu-west-3, eu-north-1, ap-northeast-1, ap-northeast-2, ap-south-1, me-south-1, and sa-east-1 are mapped to other regions.
us-west-1, eu-west-3, eu-north-1, me-south-1, and sa-east-1 are mapped to other regions.

ap-northeast-1, ap-northeast-2, ap-northeast-3, ap-south-1, ap-southeast-1, ap-southeast-2, ca-central-1, cn-north-1, cn-northwest-1, eu-north-1, eu-west-2, eu-west-3, me-south-1, sa-east-1, us-east-2, and us-west-1 are mapped to other regions.
ap-northeast-3, cn-north-1, cn-northwest-1, eu-north-1, eu-west-3, me-south-1, sa-east-1, us-east-2, and us-west-1 are mapped to other regions.
ca-central-1, eu-north-1, eu-west-3, me-south-1, and sa-east-1 are mapped to other regions.
eu-north-1, eu-west-3, me-south-1, and sa-east-1 are mapped to other regions.
ap-northeast-1, ap-northeast-2, ap-south-1, ap-southeast-1, ap-southeast-2, ca-central-1, eu-central-1, eu-north-1, eu-west-2, eu-west-3, me-south-1, and sa-east-1 are mapped to other regions.
ap-northeast-1, eu-north-1, eu-west-3, me-south-1, and sa-east-1 are mapped to other regions.
eu-north-1 and ap-northeast-1 are mapped to other regions.
eu-north-1 is mapped to another region.
ap-southeast-2, eu-west-2, me-south-1, sa-east-1, and us-east-2 are mapped to other regions.
ap-southeast-2, eu-west-2, and us-east-2 are mapped to other regions.

project.description: Enables support for overrides, prevents using unsupported versions of the CLI with overridden resources

values.description: The CLI ignores the value of this flag
The CLI ignores the value of this flag
